bow: unexpected mom pro tips when left the hospital the nurse gave me bag of specimen cups to store breast milk or baby food thought it was bizarre but these things are the best they are the perfect size pre sterilized and crazy cheap what unexpected mom pro tips have you picked up along the way always park right next to the cart corral at stores absolutely keep wipes everywhere and not just when they re in diapers either ca tell you how many times ve gotten seconds away from leaving the house only to have my year old walk out with stuff all over his face wear jeans ca tell you how many times can wipe noses and sticky hands on my jeans and nobody is the wiser our brand new target store has those spots marked as parents with kids spots so great when they are itty bitty pack an extra shirt for yourself in the diaper bag pants if you can fit them do know how many times wished had one or bought something just because of poo or spit up accidents especially if your car is door sure most people already know this one but always always bring another set of clothing for them when they re in diapers or even little bit after being potty trained we went to the hospital to get the regular shots my daughter needed and she had poo explosion was new mother she was only about month old did have an extra set of cloths and could just let her sit in her onsie with poop all up the back of it felt like terrible mother carrying around my diaper clad baby bless them for their efficiency but always have to shake my fist when they over eagerly take all the carts back into the store rather than leaving couple in the corral when in doubt nurse the baby especially the first few weeks forget the rules because the baby does know them anyway not very far along in this little journey of mothering but my sister got me bulk package of doggie poo bags you know those small little guys that come attached one after the other they work perfectly for soiled diaper great if you are at friend house that is baby friendly they should have to deal with our child poo diaper also great if you are somewhere close to garbage can your car for example spare bag in the trunk with blanket pair of cheap gloves jeans and fleece pullover huge lifesaver oh and few gallon ziplock bags stashed in the car and diaper bag you only need two nursing bras wear it in the shower with you and hang it up then put on the other one deleted walmart sells scented bags like these in the baby department with special holder that can clip on to anything stick stinky diapers in there and then ca smell thing they are the exact same thing but the dog ones are usually bit cheaper emergency car kit for each kid and yourself extra shirt hoodie underwear diapers and wipes also blanket that can also be used as picnic mat and at least hand towel holy shit this is genius wish thought of this during the summer always stash few ziploc bags in my diaper bag for this very reason if you are powder formula feeding portion the formula in bottles keep jug of water in your car obviously replace it often when teething freeze meat fruit veggies in bite sized pieces and the best one when baby is sleeping you should also take nap fuck housework it can wait trust me it will still be there when all wake up never offer choice that you do want your child to choose what rules would be against nursing the baby not being smart genuinely asking my answer to everything in my short weeks as mom has always been see if some boob will help lol these are 50 for the first set of baggies and container then 50 for each refill all of the doggie bags ve seen were scented but could be mistaken think some people worry about nursing too much but there really is such thing my motto was milk makes everything better bummie pats we use em to get our girl to sleep in our arms when she tired but fighting it then when we re laying her down to sleep in her crib more bummie pats nice and firm and increasingly more gentle until you just hold your breath and back away they help keep her from just flopping over and waking up as soon as we lay her down some of you might think crazy but seriously bummie pats just heard choir of angels in my head sheer brilliance deleted peri bottle filled with liquid laundry detergent nail brush ultimate stain fighting tools approve of your rule there is no such thing as nursing too much lol yup always do this but then how do you measure the water if the formula is in the bottle taking up space got formula dispenser and boil water and put it in the bottle before leave the house so both the water and the formula are pre measured you just changed my life the whole thing my son is 15 months and boob is still always the answer hungry boob tired boob angry boob sad boob mum trying to chat with someone boob bumped your head boob it just always peanut butter bainne time just taught my husband this he thought was genius ha flannel backed plastic tablecloth available in myriad of colors designs at dollar stores under the high chair does catch everything but it lot easier to shake off zillion cheerios for the birds than scrape them off the floor as if they were cement later put cheap plastic potty in your trunk when potty training perfect for road trips or the park when minutes notice isnt enough to find restroom we started doing that after year what difference they are so damn expensive and honestly our regular trash sits on an outside porch anyway you are genius envy your time of not wasting diaper pail liners you could do tester at home see how much the total amount in bottle should be with te powdered formula in then just pour water to that amount if its inbetween lines use sharpie to make dot card board baby books make great coasters just saying also never under estimate the power of singing could nurse and formula was cheap my daughter was also tongue tied until months old so no bottle or pacifier to soothe the sucking response singing worked every single day even now at 18 months she gets frustrated and all it takes is the itsy bitsy spider and she done 180 emotional wise your voice is powerful tool they ve been listening long time our formula very specifically said add powder to water and not vice versa would always keep three way dispenser full of formula an extra bottle and bottle of water in the car the bottle had the oz on it and pre measured the amount of powder into the dispenser you can get them anywhere wal mart babies us etc very handy my daughter and took weekend trip over the summer that was hours in the car each way we used that thing so much added tip line the potty with plastic grocery bag for easy cleaning folded paper towel in the bowl can catch splashes that startle tiny butts think this is good life philosophy as well lol it almost always helps any time mine cries the boob fixes it definitely if it not an option do present it to anyone as an option yourself included the dollar tree sells scented ones as well that my system too yeah it never seems to mix as well when the water is added to the formula you could also try reusable wet bag slightly larger cost upfront usually around 10 but you will never run out and it can be washed with the soiled clothes they are also great for swimsuits so they stay useful even beyond the baby toddler stage but how often do you shower that the real promom tip we use shower curtain liner bucks and you can actually see the mess we did tablecloth first and it was orange striped accidentally stepped on squash because it blended in ew use regular trash bags in our diaper dekor http www toysrus com product index jsp productid=2919753 crushed rice krispies make great coating for slippery finger foods like banana pieces it seems like lot of moms are using diaper genies but all ve ever done was use the plastic shopping bags you know you have billion stashed under your kitchen sink great for poopy diaper and instant laundry bag for dirty clothes if you re away from home if you have seriously gross diaper double bag it tie it off and throw it in the trash no smell one of lucky ones my kid been good at amusing himself since birth can put him in his crib and he ll stare at his mobile and chew on things for about the length of time it takes me to shower and get dressed ooo that good one when giving newborn babies who hate baths bath give cover their chest in warm wet adult washcloth it keeps them warm and kept my newborn from screaming bloody murder through the whole bath oh my god you just changed my life agreed my husband is so confused on why always have an outfit in the car some people are of the mindset to get baby on feeding schedule that convenient sometimes wonder if these people have children or two this http www infarrantlycreative net 2011 08 wipes container reuse and giveaway html also the corner of the washcloth can cover the wee bits to protect the bathroom mirror it hard and it does work everyday but we went to hours in between each nursing for her first few weeks of existence slowly but surely it stuck she started eating more at her routine feeds and less at her oh god stop crying ll feed you feeds the rules became regular life and we could plan our days around them congrats on your new baby by the way what clever clever clever idea thank you when baby starts cruising and close to walking and wants to walk around holding your hands all day use an aden and anais swaddle blanket under their arms across the chest to hold them up gives you the ability to stand upright saves your back and helps them learn balance http imgur com yyn9d jpg we used small receiving blanket nicu nurses showed us this and you just uncover one piece at time worked wonderfully on our chunkette that is actually not problem ve had yet genious step closer to kid leash no it is being lazy but it is being helpful to them and your back have nerve damage from her birth so bending over hours day is really feasible sorry the child leash was joke this is very good tip for parent and child oh oops ve been on the travel flight day from hell and going to just guess my sense of humor was lacking oh my god thank you use regular trash bags in my diaper genie saves so much money we change our kitchen trash pretty much every day rarely up to every 3rd day have hard time understanding the need for diaper pales and bagging the diapers peri bottle also good for rinsing baby in the bath filled with clean warm water to use after bath water gets all soapy have twins and bought an industrial diaper bin it designed for daycares and assisted living centers it turned out to be one of the smartest purchases ve made love it bought cute stretchy bracelet that use to wear around the wrist on the side of which boob will be next for nursing that way do have to remember just switch the bracelet to the other wrist while am nursing keep toothbrush holder with bendy straws in it in your bag frozen waffles make great teething biscuits and once they re old enough soft book place in the crib at night once they are asleep can sometimes buy you extra sleep in time in the morning forget baby tubs just wash baby in the kitchen sink your back will thank you vanilla same it glorious that is good haha used mine for homemade wipe solution we were doing cloth diapers and cloth wipes yay for reusing haha the book in the crib has been working with mine already she loves books although it probably only buys us 10 20 minutes it still great tool was going to suggest grocery bags this takes it step further oh my need to get started on this one to add to this keep towel in my trunk wet kids or pets spills unexpected mud and even injury friend snapped her leg in two and they used the towel in her trunk to tie it off and clean up some of the blood until the ambulance got there great idea have an unused peri bottle that ve been saving in case found another use for it got two when left the hospital and only used one of them thank you being *even taller* than is comfortable to use the sink put the baby tub up on the counter to save my back makes me keep the counter clean too bought kitchen trash can with foot lever lid and just took that bag out every day when lived in an apartment complex with dumpster now that we re in house with weekly pickup the arm amp hammer diaper pail is well worth the money for the odor control and thick bag the dog tried to get into one once never again we used wheat germ like the rice crispier idea too thank you wow this seems so obvious and yet constantly making that mistake yup especially in the car think have pack of wipes in nearly every room do have diaper genie or anything like that we use the leftover boxes from diapers and wipes as trash cans on high shelf so our boys ca reach them it rarely gets that old diaper smell but when it does we replace the box with fresh one no air fresheners needed my house we call it mummy magic also use these on my table buy seasonal ones on sale at the craft stores and throw them out once the season is over we gave up on the floor because the previous owner decided beige carpet was sensible choice for dining room and we ve bought hardwoods to install and just have had the time yes but now my little one is two shower about twice week if lucky amusing himself means being destructive at this point thank goodness have dog very rarely have to clean up after meals unless it something he does like my baby hated bathtime for the longest time even when we graduated to the bathtub until figured that the recommended temperature was too cold once made it little warmer he became regular water baby had moment like this when visiting my grandmother in rehab center managed to craft tank top was wearing into dress for her had two layers on we got some strange looks pull ups are the enemy of potty training it confusing go cold turkey always did that anyways best spot my baby loves her bath time she hates when it ends this works great for me the baby tub have sits over the top of the sink wow how old is she my son loves it now but hated it for the first month or so just found that the other day and had an almost empty lysol container as soon as it was empty did this and it so handy you re welcome learned that trick from mom used to work for as nanny best training for motherhood ever deleted deleted my son has always loved baths even right out of the hospital he was in the nicu for 17 days so out of the hospital he could be fully submerged in the water now at 18 months he says bath and if we try to ignore him in an attempt to hold off bath time until before bed he will bring us towel and ask again at that point we give in how can you say no to toddler who actually loves bath time anytime friend or co worker has baby this is in the basket of things get them with thing of extra refills she is almost weeks she could be fretzy and crying but once she is in the bathtub she coos and calms down use the small tubes got at the hospital when was trying to breastfeed for the formula the tall ones hold scoops just right that way can keep the water measured in the bottle put in the diaper bag if you keep water in your car change it like *every day* especially if it remotely warm out inside car gets much hotter much faster than outside and the heat will cause chemicals to leech from the plastic jug sounds like he does burp the baby enough yep we keep box on the dining table lol they re clean never used for diaper changes puppy training pads in the diaper bag to use as disposable changing pads have yet to find public bathroom changing table that had liners and you do have to carry around messy reusable pad if there been poo splosion wipes and kleenex in every room of my house when my littlest one is really grumpy and crabby will put him in costume he loves he still crabby but it makes dealing with the fits lot easier the absurdity of baby rolling around crying in dragon costume melts away the stress pretty fast second tip nylon waterproof pants over the underwear feels the same as wetting their pants so goes fine with the cold turkey thing but saves your carpet couch used these dappi ones http www babybestbuy com dappi nylon diaper pants 301 html for and they wash and dry along with normal clothes no special instructions like with the vinyl or plastic ones this is actually pro daycare tip as its what our daycare recommends for the potty training room and they strongly request that parents do the same at home to move the process faster or just get dog think our dog welcomed our kids so easily in part because it meant so much extra table food and our kitchen floor looks great lol we use baby washcloths and my husband and usually have one in our pocket at any given moment also good got yes was so bummed when my dog was on vacation at family members house had to actually sweep the dining room floor keep wipes diaper and change of clothes in each car of the household forgot to bring the diaper bag when going to the corner store and did bother go back for it since we were coming right back she puked everywhere during the ride and had to buy diapers wipes clothes and something to put over the car seat and this has happened twice now have my stash in each car wow kid gets jacuzzi no fair was going to look for something today so your advice was right on time ty got this tip from my grandma and it works like charm when cooking new food that the kid is likely to decline fix some for mommy first when the kid starts poking around tell them it adult food they probably wo like it when they insist give it to them and they will eat the veggies all up with no problems and think they are so big and mature this route avoids all the argument problems of trying something new only three and half weeks into it but totally agree great idea am the only one who does know what this is tried to google it and nothing came up haha telling you to pat that baby on his her little bum lol we call them bummie pats in our house guess forget that some people might not know wtf talking about they always have magical sedative effect on my daughter oh ok thought it was some magical product could buy free pats is even better did realize when posted that comment that it really does look like talking about product you could buy and now can not stop laughing thinking about selling bummie pats what venture but hey if you can make money doing what you love and if there is any such thing as magical product you can buy to calm your baby never found it just good old fashioned baby lovin and also breastfeeding recovered my dining set with outdoor fabric took about an hour with the staple gun everything just wipes off we do things like this as stress relief lot it makes calming down and focusing on the problem as opposed to freaking out so much easier this is what we did we were told the reason for not adding water to formula was because it made the water formula ratio off but if you premeasure the water as well and just pour it from second source into the bottle with the formula it so much easier especially for when you re driving and the kid is screaming
